meanings.definition: A Greek dish consisting of meat, typically lamb or chicken, cooked on a vertical rotisserie and served in a pita with vegetables and tzatziki sauce.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious gyros for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: The food truck serves amazing gyros every Friday.
meanings.sent3: My friend made a joke about a gyro flying in the sky like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling gyros filled the air at the festival.
meanings.sent5: The juicy meat in the gyros melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A rotating device used to stabilize or measure orientation.
meanings.sent1: The gyros on the spaceship helped it stay on course.
meanings.sent2: The gyros in the compass kept pointing north.
meanings.sent3: I pretended my spinning chair was a gyros guiding me through space.
meanings.sent4: The gyros of the drone ensured smooth and steady flight.
meanings.sent5: The gyros on the ship's navigation system prevented it from veering off course.
